translations.text: In the name of Allāh,<sup foot_note=195932>1</sup> the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.<sup foot_note=195931>2</sup>
[All] praise is [due] to Allāh, Lord<sup foot_note=195933>1</sup> of the worlds -
The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.<sup foot_note=195934>1</sup>
It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
Guide us to the straight path -
The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
